h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Flower Primes Location
content: The Flower Primes Soak can be found at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove in Black Wind Mountain upon completing Chapter 5 in The Flaming Mountains. Simply rest at the first Shrine in Chapter 6 and travel back to him to buy it for 12,000 Will.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flower_Primes.md', within the main section titled 'Flower Primes', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Flower Primes Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Flower Primes Soak can be found at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove in Black Wind Mountain upon completing Chapter 5 in The Flaming Mountains. Simply rest at the first Shrine in Chapter 6 and travel back to him to buy it for 12,000 Will.
